original_text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them, Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days?
korean_text: 어떤 바리새인들이 말하되 어찌하여 안식일에 하지 못할 일을 하느냐

sentences.original_text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them
Why do ye that which is not lawful
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 너희는 합법적이지 않은 것을 행하느냐
